cab.content:
THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.
SECRET.
C P. 803.
CABINET.
CONSTANTINOPLE.
Paraphrase of Telegram from Admiralty to Commander-in-Chief, Mediterranean afloat dated 6th March 1920.
779Z. Reference Foreign Office telegraphic reply (No 187) to High Commissioner No 176, you should take Naval Measures necessary, in conjunction with the Military Commander for securing occupation of Constantinople in accordance with policy laid down in Foreign Office Telegram No 187 of March 6th.
2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
March 6th 1920.
